column3: I was wondering if you knew the password to get outside.
Oh, pity. I thought you’d be more helpful
I didn’t mean—I just figured you’d know something since you seem to have been here longer
Here. This might help you. (Give Glowing Ball)
Maybe I should go find something that gives him some light?
I thought your kind had good night sight.
I mean...aren't you kind of a dog?
He’s clawing the bars. I better not bring that up again
To get you out so we can see who’s stronger.
You don’t think i’ve seen your kind before?
